mapper.delete: delete from bd_middle_file where ajid = #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and xorder>=200000000
mapper.insert: insert into bd_middle_file (fileid, pfileid, xname, xurl, xorder, ajid, `require`, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag,ftpserver,filename) values (#{fileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{require,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ftpserver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_middle_file set pfileid = #{pfileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xname = #{xname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xurl = #{xurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xorder = #{xorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ajid = #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `require` = #{require,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fileid = #{fileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select fileid, pfileid, xname, xurl, xorder, ajid, `require`, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_middle_file where fileid = #{fileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select fileid, pfileid, xname, xurl, xorder, ajid, `require`, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_middle_file
